channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly news - August 2023
item.description:
Microsoft Defender for Cloud Monthly news August 2023 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from July 2023.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcasts (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External content
Product improvements
Announcements
Microsoft Defender for Cloud
Secret scanning is now available as part of the agentless scanning in Defender for Servers P2 and Defender CSPM. This c...
